HOME.description: Experienced Software Developer with a track record of building quality applications. Proficient in Angular.

About.about_para1: I am an experienced Software Developer with a proven track record in building high-quality applications. I am skilled, a fast learner, and proficient in Agile methodologies. I take pride in being among the top women in tech who are actively contributing to meaningful innovations and solutions to todayâ€™s challenges. I am also a fast learner who thrives in collaborative environments with leading women in tech.
About.about_para2: My journey in software development has been fulfilling, marked by significant growth towards my goals. I have had the privilege of creating software for a school management system and working with a start-up. Currently, my focus is on developing accessible user interfaces.
About.about_para3: Outside of work, I enjoy adventures, reading, and fostering connections with other tech women who share my passion.

Experience.experience_desc1: Contributed to the development and maintenance of a comprehensive school management system, featuring modules for fee payments, course registration, result viewing, transcript management, and additional functionalities.
Experience.experience_desc2: Contributed to the design, development, and maintenance of a company library, incorporating key UI components such as input fields, forms, off-canvas menus, navigation bars, popovers, dropdowns, pagination, and additional features.

Project.project_desc1: My portfolio website here tells you about my professional work and experience, projects worked and the different frameworks used.
Project.project_desc2: This website helps to shorten url links of any form, displays the shortened link and you have the possibility of copying that link and pasting it anywhere and will work as the original link.
Project.project_desc3: This website was created to provide a more streamlined approach to managing and sharing information about the Student Conquest movement. It includes features such as program registration, a Stuco blog, a gallery celebrating memorable moments, and mission highlights.
